snippet.title: AMEDAMA - 1st Trailer | Steam
snippet.description:
"AMEDAMA", a side-scrolling, soul-shifting sandbox action-adventure game, brought to life with a striking new 2D style, will start early access on Steam on March 22, 2024 (Friday)!
Enjoy a 10% discount from March 22 for 14 days!

AMEDAMA Steam Store Page - Visit to Wishlist and download the demo!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2411980/__AMEDAMA/

About AMEDAMA
Yushin and his sister Yui run the local umbrella shop. One evening, as rain falls outside, a group of men burst in, killing Yushin before Yui’s eyes. With nothing but his soul remaining, Yushin must fight tooth and nail, possessing any body he can on the quest to find his sister and uncover the truth behind her disappearance. With only seven days left before his soul fades away, can he save her in time? Transport yourself to feudal Japan in the last years of the Edo period, and experience a tale of rain and reincarnation, brought to life with striking new 2D visuals.

・AMEDAMA global X (formerly Twitter) account:
https://twitter.com/amedama_global

・AMEDAMA Japanese X (formerly Twitter) account:
https://twitter.com/amedama_japan

・AMEDAMA on Steam®:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2411980/__AMEDAMA/

Game Details
Title: AMEDAMA
Genre: Side-scrolling, soul-shifting sandbox action adventure
Development / Marketing: IzanagiGames
Planning: ACQUIRE
Character design: lack (Fate/Grand Order, Touken Ranbu)
Soundtrack: Yuko Komiyama (Monster Hunter series)
Release date: 2024
Subtitles: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
Scheduled Platforms: Steam® (*Support for additional platforms planned)
Players: Single-player 
Retail price: 24.99 USD
